item.title: Audio Damage // Home
item.description:
Audio Damage // Home

If Your DAW Were Breakfast, We'd Be Bacon.

item.title: Ninstrument - A Fresh take on an old concept
item.description:
Ninstrument - A Fresh take on an old concept

SKIP TO 3:15 if you want to hear AUDIO DEMO! Excited to finally release this full featured packed instrument. We added a voltage clock out for LSDJ. This completes the voltage capabilities. You can now trigger your modular synthesizer with LSDJ and use your modular synthesizer to trigger sounds with mGB.

item.title: DivKid's Month Of Modular Issue #9 June 2016
item.description:
DivKid's Month Of Modular Issue #9 June 2016

Another month another magazine! Lots of good stuff in this one including some awesome new T shirts a long interview and chat with Datach'i and plenty more!

item.title: Datach'i - Luminist Modular (Official Video)
item.description:
Datach'i - Luminist Modular (Official Video)

From the Datach'i album "System" Pre-Order: https://planetmu.bleepstores.com/release/73752-datachi-system https://datachi.bandcamp.com/album/system Physical pre-orders from the planet-mu store and bandcamp will receive a FREE limited edition 19 track bonus album on CD-R and will be automatically entered to win a modular starter kit by Tiptop Audio which includes a Z3000 MKII Smart VCO, Happy Ending Kit as well as a 20 percent discount on a one time purchase of additional modules.

item.title: Harmonic Symmetry
item.description:
Harmonic Symmetry

Harmonic patch using the new MakeNoise tELHARMONIC is a Multi-Voice, Multi-Algorithm synthesizer, and 4ms Spectral Multiband Resonator. The master clock is the Tiptop Circadian Rhythms. Clock output running into the Modcan Touch Sequencer. Channel output one running into one intellijel Dixie (V1) for the bassline.

item.title: Galatea is the space between here and there...
item.description:
Galatea is the space between here and there...

Chaos Computer sending CV to AFG & Morphing Terrarium and gates/triggers to A-149-1/A-149-2 & A-143-2. AFG to FrequenSteiner to A-132-3 VCA hit by 143-2 Morph T to A-132-3 VCA hit by separate channel of 143-2 Additional modulation by Dual Cyclotron, Vulcan Modulator and A-149-1/2 Reverb supplied by Soundcraft 124fx

item.title: MonoRocket MX6 Case: Patches 3 - StepNoise
item.description:
MonoRocket MX6 Case: Patches 3 - StepNoise

Generative patch setup in MX6 case: MakeNoise Rene, Echophon, Optomix, DPO, 4ms RCD & Breakout, Intellijel FlipFlop, Circuit Abbey Unify & Doepfer A151
